description: Try our easy to follow Apple Doughnuts 3 Ways recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Doughnut,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Budget,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Low fat
name: Apple Doughnuts 3 Ways Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice apples and use a small cookie cutter to remove cores. Spread yoghurt over each apple slice.
To make cinnamon crunch apple doughnuts, scatter rolled oats, coconut and cinnamon over yoghurt.
To make carrot cake apple doughnuts, scatter carrot, sultanas and pumpkin seeds over yoghurt.
To make strawberry jam apple doughnuts, place strawberry onto yogurt and scatter with sunflower seeds.
